title: When can I play ranked again?
body: I know the season has ended and that the new season is starting in december. But can i play ranked during preseason? And when is that?

replies.body: Ranked is aimed to return during the preseason, per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  I recommend bookmarking it to stay up to date as we move towards the next season.  Hang tight!
